title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Japan 2024
yAxis: GDP growth rate compared to previous year
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general GDP growth rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 1.94 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum GDP growth rate compared to previous year about 0.38 was reached at Year 2014

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall GDP growth rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 1.94 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum GDP growth rate compared to previous year about 0.38 was reached at Year 2014
The line drastically increased by 3.2 times from Year 2014 to 2015, and lastly, increased by 3.2 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
